lyrics.stanza: O how nigh the Lord is unto all who call on Him! When we call, His very presence strengthens us within. Seeking Jesus, He is found, and calling, He is near— O what a comfort to our hearts to call His name so dear!

Jesus! O what a name! O Lord Jesus! Life-giving name! Name victorious, name all-glorious, Name exalted—O what a name! Jesus! Strengthening name! O Lord Jesus! Comforting name! Name to breathe in prayer, calling everywhere, "O Lord Jesus!" O what a name!

Call upon the name of Jesus, and you will be saved, O Lord Jesus, hallelujah, nevermore enslaved! We may take salvation's cup by calling on the Lord; Salvation from a host of things does His dear name afford.

In the God of our salvation we may take delight, Calling on His name at all times, though in bliss or blight. I will call upon His name as long as I shall live, Because He has inclined His ear, and grace so full does give.

We will call upon the Lord, who's worthy of our praise; Thus our grateful hearts in worship we to Him may raise. We are those who call upon His name in every place With all the saints who from a pure heart call and taste His grace.
